message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and functionality. We believe its unique features and benefits justify a special price. Therefore, I am offering it to you at $2000000. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach an agreement that benefits both parties.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. While I appreciate the quality and craftsmanship of your product, my budget allows me to only consider purchases within the range of $1000000 or less. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1500000 for your product. I hope this proposal aligns better with your business goals.
